description:
The girls want to dig up dirt on Arisu, who in the meantime has figured out Iko`s most pressing issue.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hazukashii Nara Kagi o Kakero / Camera no Mae de wa Waraenai!! / Kimi no Mae de wa Waraenai...!
Lock the Door If It`s Embarrassing / I Can`t Smile in Front of the Camera!! / I Can`t Smile in Front of You...!
恥ずかしいなら鍵をかけろ / カメラの前では笑えない!! / 君の前では笑えない...!
